name: UVAnimationFrame

description.en: Returns UV of an animation frame in a texture sheet.
description.zh: 使用输入UV和参数计算出帧动画纹理图片中的某一帧图片的纹理坐标。

info.en: If enabled indexs are iterated from right to left
info.zh: 是否下标计算从右到左

info.en: If enabled indexs are iterated from top to bottom
info.zh: 是否下标计算从上到下

main: vec2 main (vec2 UV, float Width, float Height, float Index) {
float tileY = abs(Invert.y * Height - (floor(Index * tileCount.x) + Invert.y * 1.0));
float tileX = abs(Invert.x * Width - ((Index - Width * floor(Index * tileCount.x)) + Invert.x * 1.0));
